    • About Oggie Penev


    Oggie Penev is the owner/broker of Realty Partners and the team leader of Penev Realty Advisors in Phoenix Arizona. An active real estate broker licensed in Arizona, he deals with home sales on a daily basis. He has learned the nuances of what makes a seller or buyer truly successful. Oggie and his full service team have an incredible track record of proven success marketing and selling Phoenix Metro Area homes.

    The team consists of a listing department, buyer department, inside sales, and an administrative group that includes marketing, listing and transaction management. Oggie has an associate degree in Business and Finance. He was Rookie of the year in his first year in the business, and has sold nearly 100 million to-date. Currently Oggie is ranked in the TOP 1% in the Phoenix market.
